name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build-js: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/index.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/diagnostics.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/diagnostics.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/settings.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-prod: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js && npx terser src/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/index.min.js && npx terser src/js/diagnostics.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/diagnostics.min.js && npx terser src/js/settings.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js
scripts.build-js-main: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js --source-map
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-css-prod && npm run build-js-prod
